Food is fundamental.

It sustains us, fulfills us and fuels our wellbeing. ADM is devoted to that impact every single day. Unlocking Nature. Enriching Life.

Introducing an all-new microbiome solution that can take the heat.

Our cutting-edge microbiome solutions portfolio is stronger than ever with our latest innovation: a heat-resistant postbiotic. Our customers can now deliver metabolic health benefits, highly demanded by consumers — even in snacks, baked goods and other foods and beverages produced under high heat, which typically weakens or kills live gut health bacteria. It’s a revolutionary breakthrough in microbiome benefits, and it’s only available from ADM.

Get tomorrow's microbiome solutions today. Learn more

Sustainability. It's in our nature.

We believe in paving the way through good practices, progressive solutions and mindful actions that make a positive impact. We have an unwavering commitment to global sustainability — with a holistic view of land, climate change and water. And as part of our dedication to to global nutrition, we are focused on zero hunger, helping people and communities in far corners across the world.

Read more about our partnership with Concern Worldwide

Contributing to the greater good. Making a lasting impact.

Through ADM Cares, we partner with organizations to solve challenges in three key areas:

Sustainable Agriculture

Hunger Relief

Education

Our global footprint.

With unparalleled size and scale, ADM is uniquely capable of managing every part of the nutrition supply chain, creating value at every step.

Explore Our Worldwide Reach

Unlock your potential. Enrich lives around the world.

We know the only way we can deliver on the monumental challenge of feeding the world's growing population is with an exceptional, diverse team of employees. We're 40,000 strong. And we're looking for forward-thinking professionals who are ready to make a difference.

Learn more about working with us

What's new at ADM? A lot.

It's an exciting time at ADM. We're always growing and improving. See what's happening now.
